*** Bug 88974 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

From the stack trace, the SWT container from org.eclipse.ve is returning a null
entry when asked for IClasspathContainer#getClasspathEntries().

Moving to VE for comments.
Will be available in the next integration build.
